title: == sync, corrected by elderman == @elder_man
subtitle: "Middle Finger Greetings" was not derived from the signs of challenge from the English shooters who cut off their fingers in the battle of Agnicort.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: "Middle Finger Greetings" is derived from the challenging gestures of the English shooters who were cut off by the French at the Battle of Egencort.
